mapper.insert: insert into t_activity_item (act_id, stu_id , audit, applyTime, duration) VALUES (#{activity.id}, #{student.id}, #{audit}, #{applyTime}, #{duration});
mapper.select: select id, audit from t_activity_item where act_id=#{activityId} and stu_id=#{studentId};
mapper.delete: delete from t_activity_item where act_id=#{activityId} and stu_id=#{studentId};
mapper.select: select act_type.id, act_type.name, sum(act_item.duration) finishedDuration from t_activity_item act_item inner join t_activities act on act_item.act_id=act.id inner join t_activity_type act_type on act_type.id=act.activity_type where act_item.stu_id=#{studentId} and act_item.audit=2 and applyTime between #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by act.activity_type;
select act_item.id item_id, act_item.audit, act_item.reason, act.id act_id from t_activity_item act_item inner join t_activities act on act_item.act_id=act.id where act_item.stu_id=#{id};
select COUNT(*) totalNumber from t_activity_item where act_id = #{activityId};
